key.name: show-launcher
key.summary: Global key combination to show the launcher.

key.name: show-switcher
key.summary: Global key combination to show the switcher.

key.name: activate-immediately
key.summary: Whether to activate immediately when there is just one result.

key.name: matching
key.summary: Pattern matching algorithm: 0=Substring, 1=Fuzzy

key.name: ordering
key.summary: Ordering criteria: 0=Last focused, 1=Relevancy

key.name: font-size
key.summary: Font size

key.name: icon-size
key.summary: Icon size

key.name: max-width-percentage
key.summary: Maximum percentage of screen width to take

key.name: activate-by-key
key.summary: Activate by pressing the index in the list: 0=No, 1=Function keys, 2=Number keys

key.name: activate-after-ms
key.summary: Activate "immediately" after this many milliseconds

key.name: workspace-indicator
key.summary: Whether to show a workspace indicator for each app

key.name: only-current-workspace
key.summary: Whether to show just the apps in the current workspace

key.name: fade-enable
key.summary: Toggle Window Fade

key.name: never-show-onboarding
key.summary: Never show onboarding

key.name: onboarding-1
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: onboarding-2
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: onboarding-3
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: onboarding-4
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: onboarding-5
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: onboarding-6
key.summary: 0 for not shown, 1 for shown and never again, 2 for shown but show again

key.name: launcher-stats
key.summary: Launcher stats stored as json.
